metadata.title: Code de la justice de paix /
metadata.creator: Guichard, Augustin Charles, approximately 1760-
Guichard, Augustin Charles, approximately 1760-
France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
metadata.description: "Nouvelle édition augmentée du décret additionnel du premier décembre, et de diverses explications données par le Comité de Constitution sur plusieurs questions relatives aux juges de paix"--T.p., [1er cahier]
"Assemblée nationale, 1789. La loi et le Roi"--Device on t.p., cahiers [1]-7
Tome second comprised of cahiers 6-8, continuously paged
T.p., cahier 8 lacks author name; includes vignette
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française. Cf. II, 15969; different edition listed
Includes index to Tome second at end of cahier 8
Stamp, t.p. of cahiers [1] and 6: La ou ailleurs
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding. Inconsistent page sizes. Damaged pages.
